name: Puzzle World
description:
Move animals to match the same pieces
Match 3 or more animals and clear various missions!
Experience the world of fairy tale with 500 stages and heart-warming girl Aya!

[Features]
- brain puzzle game with simple rule
- no play limit such as heart, play as much as you can!
- can play even without network!
- game file is as low as 10M, light-weight download!
- supports tablet screen
- supports 14 languages

Homepage:
